solution_line_template: Jerome rides a total of {miles_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{miles_per_day}*{num_days}={miles_in_12_days}>>{miles_in_12_days} miles in 12 days.
So, he will ride {total_goal} - {miles_in_12_days} = <<{total_goal}-{miles_in_12_days}={miles_on_13th_day}>>{miles_on_13th_day} miles on the 13th day to finish his goal.
